parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Connects the client to the provided server.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
* only works on the [[Arma 3 Main Menu|Main Menu]].
* must be executed from [[isUIContext | UI context]], such as ''onButtonDown'' or similar events (see [[User Interface Event Handlers]]).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[connectToServer]] [ip, port, password]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ip: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> port: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> password: [[String]] - "" if no password

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[connectToServer]] ["192.168.0.2", 2302, "test"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[serverCommand]] [[getSteamFriendsServers]]
</value></part></template></root>
